channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: AI investments are booming. Here’s a list of multi-billion dollar deals from Nvidia, Oracle, and more
item.description: Nvidia is set to invest up to $100 billion in OpenAI and supply it with data center chips, in a deal that gives the chipmaker a financial stake in the...

item.title: Court Rules: Hershey Halloween Candies Are Sufficiently Spooky
item.description: The candy company just defeated a lawsuit filed by unhappy customers.

item.title: Trump goes off script in UN address, praising Germany for returning to nuclear energy and fossil fuels: ‘All green is all bankrupt’
item.description: In remarks tied to the UN week, Trump repeated the argument that Europe—and specifically Germany—turned back to traditional fuels after pursuing renew...

item.title: Warren Buffett retires from Berkshire Hathaway in 100 days—and Apple could be on the chopping block
item.description: Berkshire’s accelerated Apple selling is predicted to pick up upon Buffett's retirement.

item.title: Milei’s peso is 20% overvalued and fragile, analysts say

item.title: Scientists just discovered the time of day when you’re smarter, more focused, and at your cognitive best

item.title: The rise of the CEO brand

item.title: Trump administration to redistribute $2.4 billion from California’s high-speed railroad
item.description: The Trump administration wants to redistribute $2.4 billion it pulled from California’s high-speed rail project as part of a new $5 billion program an...

item.title: ‘It Was a Masterstroke of Creating Chaos’: The H-1B Rule That Left Companies Scrambling
item.description: An immigration expert explains what employers and immigrants should do amid the changes—and why this might be a chance to fix a broken system.

item.title: Colossal Raises More Money, Announces Pigeon Innovations
item.description: Texas-based company, Colossal Biosciences, announced groundbreaking advances in avian cloning last week, along with a new funding round.

item.title: Mamdani draws NYC investors to advise him if he wins mayor race
item.description: Members of NYC's business community are forming an advisory group in an effort to guide the mayoral candidate if he wins the election in November.

item.title: Want to Live a Longer, Healthier Life? Recent Science Says Your Genetics Are Only 2 Percent of the Longevity Equation
item.description: How you’re made does impact how long you’ll live, but what contributes more? What you do on a regular basis.

item.title: Top analyst says the U.S. bull market dates all the way back to the 1980s, and stocks just hit a potentially unsustainable 363% of GDP
item.description: It was only 212% at the height of the dotcom bubble, according to calculations by JP Morgan Asset Management's David Kelly.
